mapper.insert: INSERT INTO menu (seq,menu_group,menu_explain, menu, price, imgName, soldout) VALUES (#{seq},#{menu_group},#{menu_explain},#{menu},#{price},#{imgName},#{soldout})
mapper.select: select distinct menu_group,menu,price,imgName, soldout,menu_explain from menu where seq =#{seq}
select distinct menu_group, menu_explain, price, imgName,soldout from menu where menu=#{menu}
mapper.update: UPDATE menu SET soldout=#{soldout} WHERE menu=#{menu}
mapper.select: select addmenu, addmenu_price from menu where menu=#{menu} and seq=#{seq} and addmenu is not null
